info.name: DataApi_Dev
info.description:
This collection which contains IntermedaiteData and MetaData API services 

IntermedaiteData:
1.POST-Subscribe The Topic
2.GET-All Subscriptions Data
3.GET-One Subscription Data
4.GET-Data As per Subscription Key
5.DELETE-Subscription By ID

MetaData:
1.GetAll_TMS_Records
2.Get_TMS_ByLocode
3.Get_Objects_ByLocode
4.Get_SpecificObect_ByLocode
